directions: In a medium saucepan bring the water to a boil over high heat.  Stir in the carrot and mushrooms and boil for about 7 minutes.  Add the noodles and the flavoring packet; stir to break up the noodles.  Reduce heat to medium and simmer for 3 minutes.  Slowly pour in the egg and stir for 30 seconds until the egg has cooked.  Stir in the milk.
ingredients: 1 (3 ounce) package ramen noodle pasta with flavor packet
title: Slightly Healthier College Ramen Soup
